name: Snowfort
overview: SNOWFORT lets you build snowforts and throw snowballs to your heart's content. You can be any of the characters in Snowfort: a Player, a snowman, or Death. Each has it's own special characteristics to master. Battle between 6 players to gain territory by rolling up large snowballs to either build impassible walls, or throw them at your friends. Players can move and fire in all 8 joystick directions. Snowfort defines the highest levels of playability ever in any game.
